entry.def: In computing, hypertext is a way of connecting pieces of text so that you can go quickly and directly from one to another.

means.word_mean: 1. machine-readable text that is not sequential but is organized so that related items of information are connected;

sentences.sentence: "Let me introduce the word hypertext to mean a body of written or pictorial material interconnected in such a complex way that it could not conveniently be presented or represented on paper"--Ted Nelson
